headline: Road Safety Market Surges to $12.39 billion by 2030 - Dominated by Siemens (Germany), Motorola Solutions (US), Jenoptik (Germany)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Aug. 26, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Road Safety Market is projected to grow from USD 6.69 billion in 2025 to USD 12.39 billion by 2030, at a CAGR of 13.1% during the forecast period.
